data.text: On October 9 at 11:00am EDT we will have a live discussion on how to reignite growth in emerging markets and developing economies. Send us your questions on this topic now using #WEO https://t.co/BbiyJkpJ1M #PoliciesForGrowth #StructuralReforms https://t.co/bmAekVOWyd

Join us on October 10 at 10:00 am EDT for a live conversation with CNBC’s @eschulze9 and the author of the latest IMF research on #SustainableFinance. https://t.co/WM47lUIEgb #GFSR https://t.co/6UUD8zBGZX

First speech by IMF Managing Director @KGeorgieva on the state of the global #economy, followed by a conversation with Bloomberg’s @tomkeene on the priorities ahead of the 2019 Annual Meetings. 

Join us here! October 8 at 10am ET. ⬇️
https://t.co/RqUpOadjJg  #IMFMeetings https://t.co/FOdncrSoGH

Recent IMF research looks at whether regional economic differences within #AdvancedEconomies are widening or narrowing. .@KGeorgieva will become the 12th Managing Director of the IMF and the first person from an emerging market economy to lead the IMF since its inception in 1944. Here is a look at what the job entails. https://t.co/AJTmt9XZ9R https://t.co/PiwfGxwxQv

A look at Managing Director-designate @KGeorgieva’s profile  – First person from an emerging market economy to lead the IMF since its inception in 1944. https://t.co/Kjis4i6aDi https://t.co/wRZTbEDVEV

MD-designate @KGeorgieva, a Bulgarian national, comes to the IMF with a wealth of experience in economics and working for major international organizations. She is also 1st person from an emerging market economy to lead the IMF since its inception in 1944. https://t.co/Kjis4i6aDi https://t.co/UWZ7XBtNM6

Managing Director-designate @KGeorgieva: My priority for the IMF is to help countries minimize the risk of crisis and be ready to cope with downturns. Longer term, the objective is to build stronger economies on the foundation of sound policies. https://t.co/r0PhcORjEk
.@KGeorgieva on her selection as new IMF Managing Director: It is a huge honor. The Fund is a unique institution with hard working, highly committed staff. https://t.co/j7L0GBYdBa

Want to learn more about the work of the IMF on #SustainableDevelopment? Don’t miss @Lipton_IMF one-on-one conversation with Jeff Sachs at @ICSD_Conf today. LIVE at 4pm ET.  https://t.co/YeUCbHrwqL #SDGs #ICSD2019 #WorldLeadersForum https://t.co/S6y568LSfX

.@KGeorgieva on her selection as IMF Managing Director: I am a firm believer in the IMF’s mandate to help ensure the stability of the global economic and financial system through international cooperation. https://t.co/Izt1GVWXBr https://t.co/PHu4QYk0RN

The IMF Executive Board representing the 189-member countries has selected Kristalina Georgieva as Managing Director for a five-year term starting on October 1, 2019. https://t.co/0Hs1YsTDKO https://t.co/neTUsmNIZ1
